name: Chaotic Sword
description:
The world is plunged into deep darkness. Creatures have invaded the surface of the earth and it is you, the famous legendary sword who must put an end to this chaos!

  Be careful to not run out of energy 

-----

How to play

Use arrow to move your sword

Game created for the MiniJam100

-----

Music: “Night Pulse”, from PlayOnLoop.com
